name: $in-progress
desc: Actions implied by the administration have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called "suspended".

name: $on-hold
desc: All actions that are implied by the administration have occurred.

name: $completed
desc: The administration was entered in error and therefore nullified.

name: $entered-in-error
desc: Actions implied by the administration have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.

name: $stopped
desc: The authoring system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this request. Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, it's just not known which one.
